import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, animateScroll as scroll } from 'react-scroll' import Dropdown from './Dropdown' export default function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => { setClick(!click) console.log('clicked') } const closeMobileMenu = () => { setClick(false) console.log('closed') } return ( <>
YEMKAS
Home Service Project Contact
) }
